name: bnj1405
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: sylib(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c1, ciun(s0, c0, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, ciun(s0, c0, c2)))
-| wb(wcel(c1, ciun(s0, c0, c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, ciun(s0, c0, c2)))
-| wb(wcel(c1, ciun(s0, c0, c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c1, ciun(s0, c0, c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, ciun(s0, c0, c2)))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

comment: First-order logic and set theory. (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
